title: Reducing our environmental impact (The Royal Bank of Scotland Group plc)
text: ( Source : The Royal Bank of Scotland Group plc) We have exceeded the stringent targets for energy, water and waste reduction that we set in 2011 / 2012 . Our recycling target was particularly ambitious, and we missed it by just 2%. We are also
